Perceptor

Perceptor laughted quietly and said "If you want to do that not know 
LEgacy's faction, what would you do with me that still I'm a predacon?"
then he smirked, and stated to observe the reacion of Nightlight and smiled 
"She seems to be totally healed and with no psicological damage... Amazing"



-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Wednesday, June 01, 2011 1:33 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: the ARK to awaken from sleep!

> <OLD>
>
> "Is that what that vibration was all about? I thought it was another 
> quake. Okay so what did Legacy do ta deserve another shout match with 
> Tucson?"
>
> Quickstride looks back to him.
>
> "The usual, he tried to go against Tucson's orders. And you know what 
> happens if we disrespect a Prime, right?"
>
> Uproar nodds.
>
> "Ohh yeah, that's why I would never dare ta do anything like that, noooo 
> waaaay, especially with Tucson. As far as I'm concerned, like Rodimus, 
> what he says, goes. Legacy better watch his step, that's two strikes 
> against him now. And yeah, I've been keepn' count."
>
> Straight Shot frowns.
>
> "I'm surprised he's even still with us. Something about him so creeps me 
> out it's not funny."

<NEW>

Lord Elder watched as Legacy walked away and Tuscon and Talon began
talking. He sighed again and began walking to where the others were.
He could hear thier conversation.

"Are you really counting?" Lord Elder and Quickstride a curious look
on his face. His face and form looked a little bigger than before, his
face clear and shiny, and yet he still managed to have a haggered look
on his face.

"While you are counting, don't forget while everyone else was off
fighting in the battle when Cyclonus and his drones were sacking
everyone including the Predacons that Legacy single handedly held the
Ark against 5 of Cyclonus' most powerful cronies. When we had to go
rescue Rodimus who was there helping, taking much of the damage and
expending his precious energon to shield you guys. That was Legacy."

Lord Elder frowned, "Has anyone ever even talked with legacy? Does
anyone even know the first thing about him? He arrived here from
Primus knows where and no one even asked him anything. You trust him
when the energon chips are down, but now you are ready to boot him
out."

"What are we Maximals or rabble. If we turn to fighting among
ourselves then what are we?" Lord Elder shook his head as he began to
walk away. "And before you go betting on who would win the battle you
were discussing, you might want to find out more about Legacy first."

(TAG)

Preston
